member.summary: Partitions entries among a collection of IBuckets

member.summary: Derive an entry's Key from the entry's Hash value
member.returns: returns the Key value of an entry, based on the Hash

member.name: M:Roblox.BucketStore.IBucket.DeriveHash(System.String)
